Text.Page:
Run west from Vindicator Outpost, and you'll reach the slave marketâ€”the Rain Cages. Here's the least surprising order you'll ever get: destroy that market!

Yeah, I try to craft straightforward missions.

Your first step: Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:12#15#Red Lash cleavers} guarding the slave market. With them out of the picture, the rest should be easier.

The path is clear, then?

I can see it now. Dozens of babies all named "" by their grateful parents...who were all slaves you freed when you seized the Kazuur Syndicate's slave market.
